https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/o9UeNQ17TCNxqITn7iq3HxZUg0y.jpg A short film that depicts the unmentionable love between two Mongolian boys - one from the city and one from the countryside. To ensure the safety of the Mongolian actors, their faces are covered by "khadag" a traditional blue scarf. Behind the Blue Sky
